sentences.en: A layer of nickel catalyst was provided to promote the endothermic reaction of steam and methane.
sentences.cn: 底层镍催化剂促进蒸汽和甲烷的吸热反应.

sentences.en: A saturated solution of sodium bicarbonate ( 13 L ) was added in portions ( endothermic, gas evolution ).
sentences.cn: 阿的碳酸氢钠 ( 13L ) 饱和溶液中添加了部分 ( 吸热, 气量 ).

sentences.en: At very high temperatures, more endothermic reactions play a role.
sentences.cn: 在很高的温度下, 更多的吸热反应起作用.

sentences.en: Both of endothermic pyrolysis and exothermic oxidation occurred in smoldering material during the heated process.
sentences.cn: 阴燃材料在受热升温过程中会发生热解吸热反应和氧化放热反应.

sentences.en: Go from reactants to products, that becomes endothermic.
sentences.cn: 从反应物到生成物的过程，是吸热的。

sentences.en: Is Hell exothermic ( gives off heat ) or endothermic ( absorbs heat )?
sentences.cn: 地狱是散 发热量 还是吸收热量?

sentences.en: This process is endothermic with rapid carbon deposition and deactivation of the catalyst.
sentences.cn: 此过程是吸热的,同时很快发生碳积沉并使催化剂活性减低.

sentences.en: Whether the reaction is exothermic or endothermic.
sentences.cn: 反应是放热的还是吸热的。

trans.tran_cn: <化>吸热的，吸能的，由吸热而产生的，<动>温血的
trans.tran_en: (of a chemical reaction or compound) occurring or formed with the absorption of heat
